projects.title: Laptop E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A web-based e-commerce platform for selling laptops, built using the Spring Framework. The project follows the MVC architecture, ensuring scalability and maintainability. It integrates various Spring modules along with JSP for the frontend and MySQL as the database.

projects.title: Clothing Store Management Website
projects.description: A full-stack web application for managing a clothing store. Admins can handle inventory, reports, and users, while customers browse and make purchases. Built with NestJS (backend), React/Next.js (frontend), and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: TinTinShop ‚Äì Mobile Drink Ordering App
projects.description: A mobile app for ordering drinks, built with React Native (Expo) and Java Spring Boot. Includes customer and admin features like order placing, menu browsing, product management, authentication, file uploads, and database/cloud integration.

projects.title: Sweet Backend ‚Äì Core API System for Savings Management
projects.description: A secure backend API system for a savings app, built with Spring Boot. Includes JWT auth, role/permission-based access, email verification, and clean project structure for scalable multi-user systems.
